# UTILITY FUNCTIONS

printf <- function(pattern, ...) {
  cat(sprintf(pattern, ...))
}

print_file <- function(file) {
  cat(paste(readLines(file), "\n", sep=""), sep="")
}

extract_one_draw <- function(stanfit, chain = 1, iter = 1) {
  x <- get_inits(stanfit, iter = iter)
  x[[chain]]
}
